title: I Only Need Bid McPhee. Who has one???
author: TimD

posts.post_title: I Only Need Bid McPhee. Who has one???
posts.post_content:
Thanks for your help. I have all sorts of cards to trade too.

-Tim

Two questions :

What do you need that involves Bid McPhee?

What make and model cars are we talking about? I always wanted a Karmann Ghia.

John "Bid" McPhee in an Old Judge Card will finish the collection I have of a card for every HOF Player, Manager, Exec, and Negro Leaguer. 

Not a car, simply a 19th Century Card as this section is dedicated to.

Thanks

[quote name="TimD" post=2182790]John "Bid" McPhee in an Old Judge Card will finish the collection I have of a card for every HOF Player, Manager, Exec, and Negro Leaguer. 

Not a car, simply a 19th Century Card as this section is dedicated to.

Thanks[/QUOTE]
Wow Tim, best wishes on closing it out, quite an accomplishment.

[quote name="TimD" post=2182790]I have of a card for every HOF Player, Manager, Exec, and Negro Leaguer.[/QUOTE]

[IMG]https://thumbs.gfycat.com/BlandGloomyAntelopegroundsquirrel-max-1mb.gif[/IMG]

Great work. :):):)

This is the project I'm working on as well, although I am settling in a few areas. Please share the entire project once complete. 

Good luck in your "bid" to add a McPhee!

posts.post_title: Bump-  Still looking for one. Not crazy high end.
